A technique which enhances the targets gravity at the user's discretion. The enemy's mobility is diminished, as the person is crushed by gravity — and in some cases exhibit [[Wikipedia:Petrifaction|petrification]]-like symptoms and then began to crumble.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 466, page 13</ref> Using a desert region to their advantage, the user can easily bury the enemy alive by submerging them in sand.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 553, page 7</ref> When this technique is applied to the user it decreases their speed, but the increased weight drastically improves their strength. This method makes it possible for even a weak person to land a devastating hit.

== Trivia ==
* The '加重' kanji in this technique's name can literally be interpreted as 'aggravated'.
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Generations]]'', instead of the technique's actual use, Ōnoki hurls rocks at the opponent.
